title: Steph Curry Was Supposedly Spurned by Nike Over Bible Verses
subtitle: Viral social media posts and articles claimed (with no supporting evidence) that Nike didn't sign Golden State basketball star Steph Curry to an endorsement deal because he insisted on putting a Bible verse on his sneakers.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Nike didn't sign Steph Curry because the NBA star insisted on putting a Bible verse on his sneakers.
